content:
I added a comment that looked like 

// - 16 because we push in the above seq of instructions

and every time I save it turns in to

//
// - 16 because we push in the above seq of instructions

I assume it thinks I'm trying to make a list maybe? Is this just a rustfmt thing I couldn't find an issue or anything just wanted to make sure who to submit this to?
formatting is entirely handled by rustfmt, all we do is invoke it when you save the file. So you should file/look for an issue on the rustfmt issue tracker
